name: The Rocketeer (itch)
description: Welcome to the world of Rocketeering- you are Wally, a helpful new and improved Mailbot Unit, and your daily mission is to get letters circulating again out to the good people of the Six Settlements through the new and improved (yet quite dated) pneumatic mail tube system. As you do, you'll uncover stories untold, messages missed, and the joys of sorting. Good luck and may the pipes guide you!
